pages.text:
Events in Homosassa
November 8-9, 2025
Plan to be at the 50th anniversary celebration of the Homosassa Arts, Crafts & Food Festival, November 8-9, 2025. A juried art show, pottery, stained glass, wood and metal sculpture, jewelry, hand and edible crafts, delicious local seafood and other specialties, raffles, an interactive Kids Zone and live music from the area’s great bands. Plus,
commemorative shirts
and hats will be on sale. Visit the Homosassa Heritage Center that will honor the history of the festival and our riverside community.
Annual Mullet Toss & Spring Festival
Saturday, February 28, 2026
Thanks to our 2025 signature sponsor Seafood Sellar & Cafe. Watch for 2026 updates.
Weekly Classes
at the
Learning Center
Event Listing Submissions
Please fill out this quick form and we may add the event to the calendar.
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeQ01CeMFLFUk8RfnjXx-SDImoecWbfyAhSSLuWszsG4eNmbA/viewform?usp=sf_link
Disclaimer
: Event submissions are accepted from Homosassa Civic Club members and are subject to approval by the Homosassa Civic Club board. Due to space limitations, published events are those that benefit or take place in Homosassa. The Homosassa Civic Club accepts no responsibility for events it does not sponsor. No political events, programs or messages accepted

8-9-
50th Anniversary Homosassa Arts, Crafts & Seafood Festival
Date: Saturday, November 8 and Sunday, November 9, 2025
Time: Saturday, 9a-5p and Sunday, 9a-4p
Location: Homosassa Civic Club, 5300 S. Mason Creek Road
Details: Juried art show, pottery, stained glass, jewelry, wood and metal sculpture, Handcrafts, Edible crafts, Local seafood and other specialties, Beer, Live music, Kids Zone, Raffles, commemorative shirts and hats for sale. Visit the Homosassa Heritage Center that will honor the history of this festival and our riverside community.
$5 per person donation ( kids 12 and under no charge)
Only certified service dogs allowed entrance
December, 2025
1- Homosassa Civic Club Meeting
Date: Monday, December 1, 2025
Social: 6:00pm
Meeting: 6:30pm
Location: Homosassa Civic Club
13- Homosassa River Lighted Boat Parade
Date: Saturday, December 13, 2025
Time: After dusk
Location: Starts near Heritage Park
Details: Starts near Heritage Park, travels past MacRaes Landing, Crumps and Seagrass Restaurant, then back to Heritage Park

Meeting: 6:30pm
Location: Homosassa Civic Club
February, 2026
2- Homosassa Civic Club Meeting
Date: Monday, February 2, 2026
Social: 6:00pm
Meeting: 6:30pm
Location: Homosassa Civic Club
16- Pirate Invasion at Crump’s Landing
Date: Monday, February 16, 2026
Time: 5-10pm
Details: Food galore from Crump’s and other local eateries, drinks, live music, costume contests, silent auction, raffles and surprises. Proceeds go to selected non-profit organizations.
Location: Crump’s Landing
21- Bourbon Spirits and Barbecue Bash
Date: Saturday, February 21, 2026
Time:  10am-4pm
Location: Old Homosassa Heritage Park
Details: Craft drinks from multiple bourbon distilleries and fresh barbecue, live music
Cost: All-inclusive ticket price will be posted closer to event date
Coordinator: Homosassa Distillery
28- Annual HOMOSASSA MULLET TOSS & FESTIVAL
Date: Saturday, February 28, 2026
Time:  10am-4pm
Location: Homosassa Civic Club Grounds
Details: Mullet toss contest for adults and children, food and drink vendors,, live music
